_source.short_desc: Sisense is a self-service analytics and reporting tool that lets anyone create interactive dashboards & reports in minutes.
_source.long_desc: Sisense democratizes end-user reports so that every end-user receives access to the data and valuable insights that govern their business. Use the reporting software with special features to customize BI report content, control distribution lists of the report, apply filters to relevant information in certain groups, and play with the format. The final output is a report that is destined to the right audience and targeted with the correct info that makes decision making data-driven
_source.target_audience: From emerging startups to established enterprises, with the ability to scale and grow as your business does.

category_features.name: Customizable Dashboard
category_features.definition: Alter the layout and content of dashboards

category_features.name: Data Connectors
category_features.definition: Connect to big data sources

category_features.name: Data Import/Export
category_features.definition: Export reports and associated data into Excel

category_features.name: Drag & Drop
category_features.definition: Click and object and drag and drop through an interface

category_features.name: Financial Reporting
category_features.definition: Generate statements to gauge performance and financial position (ie. income statement, balance sheet)

category_features.name: Forecasting
category_features.definition: Form predictions based on past and present data/trends

category_features.name: Marketing Reports
category_features.definition: Reports specific to marketing and associated campaigns

category_features.name: OLAP
category_features.definition: Online Analytical Processing, analyze different dimensions for data discovery (complex calculations, what ifs, etc)

category_features.name: Sales Reports
category_features.definition: Reports specific to sales analysis for trends and strategies

category_features.name: Scheduled / Automated Reports
category_features.definition: Set a time to generate routine reports automatically

category_features.name: Search/Filter
category_features.definition: View different and/or more detailed information within a certain data set

category_features.name: Ad hoc Query
category_features.definition: One-off inquiries made on the as needed basis

category_features.name: Application Development
category_features.definition: Build unique software tools based on your specific requirements

category_features.name: Benchmarking
category_features.definition: Compare key metrics for the business against prominent players in the industry

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Interactive Reports
category_features.definition: Edit and personalize data view as needed

category_features.name: Mobile Reporting
category_features.definition: Access reports on mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-User Collaboration
category_features.definition: Two-way actions and data sharing between several users in real time

category_features.name: Self-service Analytics
category_features.definition: Generate reports on your own without IT involvement

category_features.name: Streaming Analytics
category_features.definition: Monitor and visualize trends across live data streams

category_features.name: Visual Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create, design, and visually represent processes within the software

related_products.short_desc: From payments to credit to fraud protection, PayPal Commerce Platform helps you meet your customers where they are.
related_products.features: The better you know your customers, the smarter you can sell. That's good for both you and your customers. Now you can use shopper insights to optimize operations and improve marketing with customizable retargeting capabilities.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
related_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Tableau Software helps people see and understand data. Tableau delivers fast analytics, visualization and business intelligence.
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based human resources solution that helps businesses streamline workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes.
related_products.features: Workday HCM is a single, cloud-based solution for workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes. The solution is used by Fortune 500 and G2k companies to operate with agility and efficiency, and for organizations to be ready for whatever comes next. Unlike rigid HR systems or point solutions, Workday HCM delivers a skills-based HCM foundation and continuously innovates to enable customer success as the impact of technology, alternative work arrangements, and employee expectations evolve.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online Advanced (Save 50%) is a cloud-based, all-in-one, accounting and business hub solution, designed for growing, small to mid-sized businesses. Get performance reporting with highly customizable tracking tools, automated workflows, and real-time revenue and cash flow management dashboards. Seamlessly integrate best-in-class Premium Apps like Salesforce and HubSpot (CRM), Bill.com (accounts payable), DocuSign, LeanLaw & more to expand your capabilities as your business needs grow.

related_products.short_desc:
Workforce Analytics for the Modern ?Workplace
Understand how your team works - from everywhere! Empower your people, hone healthy work
related_products.features: ActivTrak's workforce analytics provide predictive insights that help leaders, managers, and employees build trust, deepen engagement and boost productivity in the modern, hybrid workplace. This work is supported by the ActivTrak Productivity Lab, a global center for ground-breaking research and expertise that leverages data sourced from more than 9,000 customers and over 550,000 users.

related_products.short_desc: Sage 100cloud is an ERP platform for growing and medium-sized distributors and manufacturers.
related_products.features: With more than 30 years as a market-leader, Sage 100cloud is among the most stable and feature-rich business management solutions for mid-sized manufacturers, distributors, and service businesses today. Built for security and compliance, Sage 100cloud is a trusted solution for managing complexities associated with growth. Thanks to its business objects framework, Web APIs, and Office 365 connectivity, Sage 100cloud can be easily customized to meet the unique needs of businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: Cube's reporting platform automatically syncs data from your tech stack to your spreadsheets so you can plan better and faster.
similar_products.features: Cube is the reporting software that automatically syncs source data from your tech stack to your spreadsheets. Optimize your reporting workflows in Excel and Google Sheets by reducing manual data transfers and the risk of human error. Finance professionals who use Cube can tell the story behind the numbers faster than ever. Cube pairs the flexibility and familiarity of your spreadsheet with the control and scale of performance software.

similar_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence tool that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data.
similar_products.features: A self-service business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights on your business information. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports in minutes with no IT help. Data can be imported from applications and databases, even behind firewalls. Zoho Analytics also includes Zoho DataPrep which connect, model, cleanse, transform, and enrich data for analytics.

similar_products.short_desc: Windward Core is the global leader in embedded document generation solutions, allowing users to create any kind of document imaginable.
similar_products.features: Windward Core is the global leader in document generation solutions. Core embeds into applications with only 11 lines of code. It enables users to design templates using business logic and multiple data sources within the familiar landscape of Microsoft Office. Core is fast, easy, and removes human error, transforming the way business professionals create documents. ISVs and OEMs can quickly take their custom solutions with powerful reporting capabilities to the market by integrating with Core.

similar_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
similar_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

similar_products.short_desc: Whether you're a BI analyst or developer, people rely on you to turn raw data into powerful insights.
similar_products.features: Domo delivers the world's first cloud-based business intelligence and reporting platform, which gives executives across an organization the ability to make faster and better-informed decisions. Domo is the first solution that brings together seven products into one elegant platform enabling users to connect, prepare, visualize, engage and optimize their business around data.

similar_products.short_desc: Exchange Reporter Plus is a web-based hybrid Exchange reporting, auditing, monitoring, and content search solution.
similar_products.features: Exchange Reporter Plus is a web-based tool used to report on, audit, monitor and perform content search in Exchange Server, Exchange Online and Skype for Business. It features over 450 comprehensive reports on various Exchange objects, such as mailboxes, public folders, and distribution lists.  The tool audits granular changes and monitors the server and services 24x7. Alerts in Exchange Reporter Plus give instant notifications on critical events that require your attention.

similar_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
similar_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: Passport Software's IRS-certified ACA Software helps manage and report ACA data  to help you avoid IRS penalties.
similar_products.features:
Passport Software's reporting  and compliance management software reporting identifies full-time employees and tracks part-time employees trending towards full-time. You can  track employees adding coverage, changing statuses, contributions, affordability rates and more. 
It helps to streamline year end reporting and provides much more than just forms. 
Accommodates most payroll and ERP systems.

similar_products.short_desc: Dundas BI is a flexible, embeddable BI, reporting and data analytics platform. Everything you need is in one end-to-end tool.
similar_products.features: Dundas BI is a BI, data visualization and analytics platform for Software Vendors and enterprise organizations. Our fully customizable BI platform gives you instant access to real-time data and information from across your organization, so you can transform it into interactive dashboards and reports for faster insight into your entire business. Dundas BI  was designed to be embedded into your existing systems and applications for a great user experience. Free trial or live demo available.

similar_products.product_name: PBRS for Power BI (Power BI Reports Scheduler)
similar_products.short_desc: SSRS & Power BI Reports Scheduler: Send Data Driven SSRS & Power BI Dashboards & Reports To Unlimited Users
similar_products.features: PBRS saves time and money by making it easy to automate the distribution & delivery of SSRS & Power BI Reports & Dashboards. Simply define single or packages of Power BI reports, schedule, run them automatically, and send the reports to print, fax, folder, FTP, SMS, Dropbox, SharePoint & email in a number of standard formats including Excel, Word, PDF, HTML and more. Date & Time Scheduling, Event-Triggers, Dynamic & Data Driven Automation, Pre & Post Delivery Workflows.

similar_products.short_desc: Yellowfin is the only analytics suite that successfully combines action based dashboards with industry-leading automated analysis.
similar_products.features: Reports and dashboards that not only drive action, but allow you take action without ever leaving Yellowfin. Yellowfin reporting allows you to custom code actions right on the dashboard that call on APIs, design anything with a pixel perfect canvas, and query the data with AI with just a click. Bring your users & workflows to the dashboard for seamless data decision making.

similar_products.short_desc: Paladin's Powerfully Simple and Proven Point of Sale and Inventory Management software helps independent retail businesses run better.
similar_products.features:
Paladin Point of Sale and Inventory Management

For over 40 years, Paladin Data Corp. has been helping independent retail businesses run better. The hybrid retail system automates ordering, tracks inventory and provides detailed reports along with hundreds of integrations to enable the tools you need to succeed in managing your business more efficiently.

Learn more about Paladin's intuitive interface, easy set-up process, low monthly payments (no long-term contracts) and highly rated support.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use Financial, Operational and BI Reporting solution with focus on ERP Applications like Oracle Cloud ERP, EBS, NetSuite ..etc
similar_products.features: Easy to use Financial, Operational and BI Reporting solution that enables end users to develop their own analytics. Offering pre-built integration with several common ERP and Cloud applications such as Oracle Cloud ERP, Oracle E-Business Suite, PeopleSoft, Taleo, NetSuite and Salesforce. Orbit is a superior reporting platform for enterprise data from any application, any data source, and on any device.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Visualization software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Visualization tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Visualization software helps companies present information in an organized, graphical and easily searchable manner. This type of software is designed to integrate with existing applications and use data to build visual presentations. For related software solutions see Business Intelligence software, Knowledge Management software and Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Embedded Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Embedded Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Embedded Analytics software allows users to integrate analytical capabilities with the applications they already use and access analytical tools from within these applications.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Financial Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Financial Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Financial Reporting software automates the task of reporting an organization's financial results, status and transactions. Financial Reporting applications help organizations control and increase operational efficiencies. These solutions provide the ability to collect, translate and consolidate data from various systems and geographic locations. Financial Reporting software is related to Accounting software, Budgeting software, Business Performance Management software and Compliance software.

_source.short_desc: Sisense delivers rapid, full-scale analytics on large and scattered datasets and allows for easy exploration of complex data.
_source.long_desc:
Sisense is the only business intelligence software that makes it easy for users to prepare, analyze and visualize complex data. Sisense provides an end-to-end solution for tackling growing data sets from multiple sources, that comes out-of-the-box with the ability to crunch terabytes of data and support thousands of users--all on a single commodity server.

Sisense has already won over the hearts of some of the worlds leading, most data-intensive companies, including eBay, Henry Schein, NASA
_source.target_audience: From emerging startups to established enterprises, with the ability to scale and grow as your business does.

related_products.short_desc: Create your own custom dashboard with drag-and-drop building blocks that let you see all of your team's work at a glance.
related_products.features: On monday.com's open platform, you can create dashboards within minutes on pre-made templates. Or, add columns, widgets, and apps to fully customize your dashboard for your workflows, no matter how unique they may be. With full visibility, you'll be able to reduce long email threads and meetings while your team gets even more done. The all-in-one platform your team will actually enjoy using, monday.com's dashboards allow you to have both the "best in class" and the "enterprise suite."

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.

Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: ProWorkflow is an industry leading and much loved project, task and workflow management software.
related_products.features: ProWorkflow is an industry-leading comprehensive project management tool for teams of 5 to 5000. 17 years of experience and trusted for over 3 million projects, we understand small details through to big data. Track Gantt chart tasks, Kanban boards, time, documents, communications, quotes and invoices. Our powerful API and customizable features let you easily tailor ProWorkflow. World-class customer support & free on-boarding makes the decision to join easy.

related_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
related_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

related_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data.
related_products.features: An online business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports and dashboards in minutes, with no IT help. Data can be imported from files, web feeds, popular business applications, cloud and on-premises databases, cloud storages etc. Free for 2 users. Pricing starts at $25 per month.

related_products.short_desc: With Domo, you can empower your entire team with data insights in real-time, cloud-based dashboards.
related_products.features: Domo is no ordinary dashboard software. Built on the Domo platform, Domo's dashboards provide data in real-time, so your data is never stale. Create and share custom views of your data on the fly, in minutes, with dashboards that are orders of magnitude easier to use.

similar_products.short_desc: Create your own custom dashboard with drag-and-drop building blocks that let you see all of your team's work at a glance.
similar_products.features: On monday.com's open platform, you can create dashboards within minutes on pre-made templates. Or, add columns, widgets, and apps to fully customize your dashboard for your workflows, no matter how unique they may be. With full visibility, you'll be able to reduce long email threads and meetings while your team gets even more done. The all-in-one platform your team will actually enjoy using, monday.com's dashboards allow you to have both the "best in class" and the "enterprise suite."

similar_products.short_desc: Salesforce Datorama provides the leading cloud-based, AI-powered marketing intelligence and analytics platform.
similar_products.features: Salesforce Datorama provides the leading cloud-based, AI-powered marketing intelligence and analytics platform for enterprises, agencies, and publishers. Datorama provides marketing intelligence solutions for all marketers and helps you bring together all of your marketing data into one dashboard view. Create compelling data-driven stories with Datorama dashboards, optimize your marketing campaigns, and make data-driven decisions faster.

similar_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data.

It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports and dashboards in minutes, with no IT help. Data can be imported from files, web feeds, popular business applications, cloud and on-premises databases, cloud storages etc. Free for 2 users. Pricing starts at $25 per month.

similar_products.features: Domo is no ordinary dashboard software. Built on the Domo platform, Domo's dashboards provide data in real-time, so your data is never stale. Create and share custom views of your data on the fly, in minutes, with dashboards that are orders of magnitude easier to use.

similar_products.short_desc: Yellowfin is the only analytics suite that successfully combines action based dashboards with industry-leading automated analysis.
similar_products.features: Dashboards that not only drive action, but allow you take action without ever leaving Yellowfin. Yellowfin dashboarding allows you to custom code actions right on the dashboard that call on APIs, design anything with a pixel perfect canvas, and query the data with AI with just a click. Bring your users? workflows to the dashboard for seamless data decision making.

similar_products.short_desc: Analytics platform to connect to all your data sources and build and distribute highly customizable dashboards and reports.
similar_products.features:
Klipfolio is a powerful analytics and BI platform used by thousands of businesses to make better decisions. 

Connect to any data source and centralize all of your data in one place. Visualize, explore and distribute the data the way you need it. 

From highly customizable dashboards and reports to self-serve data exploration and client management, Klipfolio serves a broad range of analytics needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
similar_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

similar_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
similar_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

similar_products.short_desc: AnswerRocket uses natural language processing and AI-driven automation to generate in-depth insights and visualizations in seconds.
similar_products.features: AnswerRocket is the AI-powered solution for business analytics. AnswerRocket leverages artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques to automate the hard work of business analysis, empowering teams to generate business intelligence and advanced analytics in seconds via powerful dashboard insights. Whether you need to ask questions in plain English, create interactive visualizations and dashboards, uncover actionable insights, or automate entire workflows, AnswerRocket has you covered.

similar_products.short_desc: Create better Dashboards with automated data collection from 500+ marketing and advertising platforms. Start your free trial today.
similar_products.features: Power your dashboards with cleaned, mapped data from over 500 marketing and advertising platforms. Funnel collects data from all your channels and sends it anywhere you want, a Dashboard Solution, Data Warehouse, BI Tool. Google Sheets, Data Studio, Tableau, Looker, you name it. Stop wasting time unifying data from multiple platforms and let Funnel do the hard work so you can focus on getting the most out of your numbers and figures. Free trial available.

similar_products.short_desc: Informer 5 is a robust, extensible, end-to-end data discovery and analytics platform connecting all your on-prem and cloud data.
similar_products.features: Informer 5 is a robust, embeddable data discovery and analytics platform that simplifies the process of accessing, cleansing, blending, and analyzing data. Explore, visualize and analyze relevant data on the fly. Securely publish Reports and collaborate with colleagues. Generate Dashboards that consolidate critical performance metrics.

similar_products.short_desc: FullStory helps businesses understand, measure, and perfect their digital experience across sites and apps.
similar_products.features: FullStory is a trusted Digital Experience Intelligence (DXI) platform that combines rich product analytics, robust session detail, and collaboration tools to deliver real-time insights that uncover opportunities on web and mobile experiences. FullStory's best-in-class DXI platform helps brands understand their users' digital experiences to eliminate friction and capitalize on what's successful.

similar_products.short_desc: Iridium provides law firms with Business Intelligence and financial analytics solutions to improve processes and profitability.

Iridium has more than 300 law firm clients globally, ranging from 40 to 2000+ timekeepers. Iridiums mission is to help firms improve processes and maximize profitability. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workflow Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workflow Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workflow Management software coordinates the flow of work and ensures changes are properly implemented. Workflow Management systems offer a collaborative environment that allows businesses to easily monitor and evaluate their processes. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.
